TopicTitle: Pteron Micro Shuttle and rescue vehicle Beta download available(9/9/2014)

Articles.Content:
I still have the model. I'll be working slowly with it.

I wish you all the best with this mod. I have absolutely no experience modding for this game but maybe there's others out there that'll help you out if you want help.
The model looks better without textures=/
For some reason my Kerbals cannot exit the WEKA, anyone know why the hatch is always obstructed?

For some reason my Kerbals cannot exit the WEKA, anyone know why the hatch is always obstructed?

No, and I can't land it. It always noses down.

No, and I can't land it. It always noses down.

Yah it's a fatherless child of a craft for sure.

I want this so much. My space station would look real awesome with a couple of these hanging it, ready to bring my kerbals to safety in case of any "accidents".The drop pod/coffin idea is really neat too. I do hope these ideas get realized, cuz they are pretty damn awesome.

Hello all, Just wanted to proclaim the fact that I am still alive and interested in getting this in game...There have been serious family issues IRL to contend with and the last 6 weeks have been rather Hellish.

I have just been in contact with Blackheart about the project, so some things are up in the air at the moment but I hope to have news of some kind soon.

Sage Sagan
Yay! Hope all is resolved with the family in a positive way.
Let's give him some more time

Hi all, thanks for the best wishes...this really is the friendliest, most well mannered forum on the internet! At the moment I have no time for anything so once again I am looking for some help. Blackheart has the textures down but the real issue is getting the thing in game. If anyone has experience with unity import etc and they can spare the time then please PM myself or Blackheart. Just to reiterate; the model is done,the textures are done and I have the blurb somewhere that I wrote for the description/VAB notes. This is an idea that still really excites me and others so if you are out there don't be shy. I wish i could give this the time right now but that simply isn't the case....DAMN.

Peace out

Sage Sagan
So is this pretty much finished, but someone just needs to import it into the game?

I know how to but Im still figuring out how some parts work. So I keep quiet. For example, I don't know which part to animate or remove or make an aileron or rudder. But Im working on it. I'm just waiting if someone better can catch. If all else fails, I can

I know how to but Im still figuring out how some parts work. So I keep quiet. For example, I don't know which part to animate or remove or make an aileron or rudder. But Im working on it. I'm just waiting if someone better can catch. If all else fails, I can

Ok cool. I can't wait for this to be out! But take your time, ill be patient:)

I know how to but Im still figuring out how some parts work. So I keep quiet. For example, I don't know which part to animate or remove or make an aileron or rudder. But Im working on it. I'm just waiting if someone better can catch. If all else fails, I can

If you haven't already, I recommend you get in touch with Nazari from the KSOS mod. He does all the unity importing for the KSOS. He would be a valuable source of information regarding getting this shuttle in game.
Thanks, I'll keep that in mind
If this project is dying out... Maybe the KOS people can integrate it in their mod... With proper credit, of course. I think it goes great with that mod.
Errm, what does it have to do with KOS?

Methinks he means KSO. But then again on the one hand Helldiver and Nazari already have a whole other shuttle they're working on, while on the other Blackheart still seems up to the challenge and Sage is getting back into the groove.
Eww no not KSO.
Im just balancing out my time, Im just discreet hehe

Hello all just to re-iterate what Blackheart said, this project is on-going. Real life has a habit of throwing multiple spanners into the works, one need only look at the checkered history of the Dream Chaser shuttle and those people know what they are doing! I love the KSO but this project will hopefully only take up a few megs in your Game data folder.

I love the KSO but this project will hopefully only take up a few megs in your Game data folder.

love this line heh.

i know some code but i'm not sure i'm the best at importing so don't han it over to me :/ (although i really want to see and get my hands on this soooo bad!!!) i may poke around and see if anyone cn help you guys import it :/

I for one am willing to wait! Good things come to those who do. I'm certainly going to be waiting with anticipation, though, it looks super nifty! Thanks for putting in as much time and effort as you have so far.
I heard you wanted to see if this is still being developed. Well,
Is there going to be a lifter for this wonderful ship or are we going to have to build our own? I am not saying you have to I am just curious as to if you are making one.
